prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with majestic wings and a vibrant color palette.
I want an elegant bird Pokemon that embodies grace and speed in its design.
Generate a Pokemon that soars through the skies with a variety of feather colors.
Make a powerful avian creature that showcases the beauty of nature and flight.
Imagine a swift Pokemon with striking patterns on its wings and a bold personality.
Design a Pokemon that represents freedom and agility, with a colorful and dynamic appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that blends shades of yellow and brown with impressive wing structures.
